plot outline: Deva works for a estate agent showing flats to clients.While showing flats to one of his clients he falls in love with their daughter who also repatriates to his feelings.Deva pretends to good impression in front of Amruta's parents and things are going well.Until a tragedy strikes where Deva will repent all his life for the mistake he committed.
title: Urfi
plot: Deva who works for an estate agent falls in love with the daughter of one of his clients. He tries to create a good impression on the family and woo the girl, unaware of an upcoming hurdle.

Deva works for a estate agent showing flats to clients.While showing flats to one of his clients he falls in love with their daughter who also repatriates to his feelings.Deva pretends to good impression in front of Amruta's parents and things are going well.Until a tragedy strikes where Deva will repent all his life for the mistake he committed.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
